results.text: Deg wayagi, war ccekk, d asali i ugdud iâabbaden.
Ur k id Nuzen, siwa d aêunu i imavalen.
Ini: "iyi d ippuweêêan, siwa: Öebbi nnwen d Öebbi Yiwen kan. Kunwi ma d imvuâen"?
Ma wexxôen, ini: "âaggne$ awen, akken ma tellam; ur éôi$ ma iqôeb, ne$ ibâad, ayen i wen ippuwaââden.
Neppa, s tidep, Issen awal d iff$en, Issen ayen tessusmem.
Ur éôi$ ma, ayagi, ahat d ahewwel nnwen, u d zzhu n tallit kan.
Inna: "a Mass iw! Eêkem s tidep. Mass nne$, Aênin, i nepper d Amâiwen, mgal ayen teppandim".
